    • Constructor Detail

      • Soap

        public Soap(boolean verboseOutput,
            boolean debugMode,
            java.lang.String propertyFilePath)
     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructor. Set parameter and load properties from file. Connection properties will be set and check if all needed files exist
        Parameters:
        verboseOutput - If true verbose information will be print out
        debugMode - If true debug information will be print out
        propertyFilePath - Path of property file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If a file do not exist. E.g. property file, certificate, input pdf etc

    • Method Detail

      • setConnectionProperties

        private void setConnectionProperties()
        Set connection properties from property file. Also convert timeout from seconds to milliseconds. If timeout can not be readed from properties file it will use standard value 90 seconds

      • sign

        public void sign(Include.Signature signatureType,
                 java.lang.String fileIn,
                 java.lang.String fileOut,
                 java.lang.String signingReason,
                 java.lang.String signingLocation,
                 java.lang.String signingContact,
                 int certificationLevel,
                 java.lang.String distinguishedName,
                 java.lang.String msisdn,
                 java.lang.String msg,
                 java.lang.String language,
                 java.lang.String serialnumber)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Read signing options from properties. Depending on parameters here will be decided which type of signature will be used.
        Parameters:
        signatureType - Type of signature e.g. timestamp, ondemand or static
        fileIn - File path of input pdf document
        fileOut - File path of output pdf document which will be the signed one
        signingReason - Reason for signing a document
        signingLocation - Location where a document was signed
        signingContact - Person who signed document
        distinguishedName - Information about signer e.g. name, country etc.
        msisdn - Mobile id for sending message to signer
        msg - Message which will be send to signer if msisdn is set
        language - Language of message
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If parameters are not set or signing failed

      • signDocumentOnDemandCertStepUp

        private void signDocumentOnDemandCertStepUp(PDF[] pdfs,
                                            java.util.Calendar signDate,
                                            Include.HashAlgorithm hashAlgo,
                                            java.lang.String serverURI,
                                            java.lang.String claimedIdentity,
                                            java.lang.String distinguishedName,
                                            java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                            java.lang.String certReqMsg,
                                            java.lang.String certReqMsgLang,
                                            java.lang.String certReqSerialNumber,
                                            java.lang.String requestId,
                                            long pollingInterval,
                                            int pollRetries)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Create SOAP request message and sign document with on demand certificate and authenticate with MobileID or PwdOTP
        Parameters:
        pdfs - Pdf input files
        signDate - Date when document(s) will be signed
        hashAlgo - Hash algorithm to use for signature
        serverURI - Server uri where to send the request
        claimedIdentity - Signers identity
        distinguishedName - Information about signer e.g. name, country etc.
        phoneNumber - Phone number for declaration of will (step-up)
        certReqMsg - Message which the signer get on his phone
        certReqMsgLang - Language of message
        requestId - An id for the request
        pollingInterval - Interval between polling requests for asynchronous signing request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If hash or request can not be generated or document can not be signed.

      • signDocumentOnDemandCert

        private void signDocumentOnDemandCert(PDF[] pdfs,
                                      Include.HashAlgorithm hashAlgo,
                                      java.util.Calendar signDate,
                                      java.lang.String serverURI,
                                      java.lang.String distinguishedName,
                                      java.lang.String claimedIdentity,
                                      java.lang.String requestId)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        create SOAP request message and sign document with ondemand certificate but without mobile id
        Parameters:
        pdfs - Pdf input files
        hashAlgo - Hash algorithm to use for signature
        signDate - Date when document(s) will be signed
        serverURI - Server uri where to send the request
        mobileIDStepUp - certificate request profile
        distinguishedName - Information about signer e.g. name, country etc.
        claimedIdentity - Signers identity
        requestId - An id for the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If hash or request can not be generated or document can not be signed.

      • signDocumentSync

        private void signDocumentSync(javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage sigReqMsg,
                              java.lang.String serverURI,
                              PDF[] pdfs,
                              int estimatedSize,
                              java.lang.String signNodeName)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Send SOAP request to server and sign document if server send signature
        Parameters:
        sigReqMsg - SOAP request message which will be send to the server
        serverURI - Uri of server
        pdfs - Pdf input file
        estimatedSize - Estimated size of external signature
        signNodeName - Name of node where to find the signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If hash can not be generated or document can not be signed.

      • signDocumentAsync

        private void signDocumentAsync(javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage sigReqMsg,
                               java.lang.String serverURI,
                               PDF[] pdfs,
                               java.lang.String claimedIdentity,
                               long interval,
                               int retries,
                               int estimatedSize,
                               java.lang.String signNodeName)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Send SOAP request for asynchronous signing to server
        Parameters:
        sigReqMsg - SOAP request message which will be send to the server
        serverURI - Uri of server
        pdfs - Pdf input file
        estimatedSize - Estimated size of external signature
        signNodeName - Name of node where to find the signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If hash can not be generated or document can not be signed.

                  PDF[] pdfs,

           throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:
        pollReqMsg -
        serverURI -
        interval: - time between polling requests, in milliseconds.

      • signDocuments

        private void signDocuments(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> signHashes,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ocsp,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> crl,
                           PDF[] pdfs,
                           int estimatedSize,
                           boolean timestampOnly)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Add signature to pdf
        Parameters:
        signHashes - Arraylist with Base64 encoded signatures
        ocsp - Arraylist with Base64 encoded ocsp responses
        crl - Arraylist with Base64 encoded crl responses
        pdfs - Pdf which will be signed
        estimatedSize - Estimated size of external signature
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If adding signature to pdf failed.

      • getTextFromXmlText

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getTextFromXmlText(java.lang.String soapResponseText,
                                                                 java.lang.String nodeName)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                                 javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        Get text from a node from a xml text
        Parameters:
        soapResponseText - Text where to search
        nodeName - Name of the node which text should be returned
        Returns:
        If nodes with searched node names exist it will return an array list containing text from nodes
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any IO errors occur
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If a DocumentBuilder cannot be created which satisfies the configuration requested

                                                                   java.lang.String nodeName)
        Get nodes text content
        Parameters:
        element -
        nodeName -
        Returns:
        if nodes with searched node names exist it will return an array list containing text from value from nodes

      • getNodeList

        private org.w3c.dom.Element getNodeList(java.lang.String xmlString)
                                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                        java.io.IOException,
                                        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Get a xml string as an xml element object
        Parameters:
        xmlString - String to convert e.g. a server request or response
        Returns:
        org.w3c.dom.Element from XML String
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - If a DocumentBuilder cannot be created which satisfies the configuration requested
        java.io.IOException - If any IO errors occur
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur

      • createRequestMessage

        private javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage createRequestMessage(Include.RequestType reqType,
                                                        java.lang.String digestMethodAlgorithmURL,
                                                        boolean mobileIDStepUp,
                                                        byte[][] hashList,
                                                        java.lang.String[] additionalProfiles,
                                                        java.lang.String claimedIdentity,
                                                        java.lang.String signatureType,
                                                        java.lang.String distinguishedName,
                                                        java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                                        java.lang.String certReqMsg,
                                                        java.lang.String certReqMsgLang,
                                                        java.lang.String certReqSerialNumber,
                                                        java.lang.String responseId,
                                                        java.lang.String requestId)
                                                 throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        Create SOAP message object for server request. Will print debug information if debug is set to true
        Parameters:
        reqType - Type of request message e.g. singing or pending request
        digestMethodAlgorithmURL - Uri of hash algorithm
        mobileIDStepUp - certificate request profile. Only necessary when on demand certificate is needed
        hashList - Hashes from documents which should be signed
        additionalProfiles - Urn of additional profiles e.g. ondemand certificate, timestamp signature, batch process etc.
        claimedIdentity - Signers identity / profile
        signatureType - Urn of signature type e.g. signature type cms or timestamp
        distinguishedName - Information about signer e.g. name, country etc.
        phoneNumber - Mobile id for on demand certificates with mobile id request
        certReqMsg - Message which will be send to phone number if set
        certReqMsgLang - Language from message which will be send to mobile id
        responseId - Only necessary when asking the signing status on server
        requestId - Request id to identify signature in response
        Returns:
        SOAP response from server. Depending on request profile it can be a signarure, signing status information or an error
        Throws:
        javax.xml.soap.SOAPException - If there is an error creating SOAP message
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing debug information

      • createPendingMessage

        private javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage createPendingMessage(Include.RequestType reqType,
                                                        java.lang.String claimedIdentity,
                                                        java.lang.String responseId)
                                                 throws javax.xml.soap.SOAPException,
                                                        java.io.IOException
        Analog to the create request message method, this one returns a polling request for asynchronous methods.
        Parameters:
        reqType -
        responseId -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        javax.xml.soap.SOAPException
        java.io.IOException

      • sendRequest

        private java.lang.String sendRequest(javax.xml.soap.SOAPMessage soapMsg,
                                     java.lang.String urlPath)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creating connection object and send request to server. If debug is set to true it will print response message.
        Parameters:
        soapMsg - Message which will be send to server
        urlPath - Url of server where to send the request
        Returns:
        Server response
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If creating connection ,sending request or reading response failed

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        indent - Set indent from left
        Returns:
        Pretty formated xml

      • getRequestId

        public java.lang.String getRequestId()
        Generate a new request id with actually time and a 3 digit random number. Output looks like 22.01.2014 17:10:26:0073122
        Returns:
        Request id as String
